title: 89/37/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 December 1988 extending for Greece the period during which seed of certain varieties of cotton and soya bean may be subject to marketing restrictions relating to the variety (only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 December 1988
extending for Greece the period during which seed of certain varieties of cotton and soya bean may be subject to marketing restrictions relating to the variety
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(89/37/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The period provided for in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC is, where Greece is concerned, extended from 31 December 1988:
(a) to 28 February 1989 in respect of the varieties listed in Annex I;
(b) to 31 December 1989 in respect of the varieties listed in Annex II; and
(c) to 30 June 1989 in respect of the varieties listed in Annex III.
Greece shall notify the Commission and the other Member States of the date from which it makes use of the authorization under Article 1 and the detailed methods to be followed.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
